price: Kuma suka ce wa fãtunsu, "Don me kuka yi shaida a kanmu?" Suka ce: "Allah, Wanda ke sanya kõwane abu ya yi furuci, Shĩ ne Ya sanya mu mu yi furuci, kuma Shĩ ne Ya halitta ku can da farko, kuma zuwa gare Shi ake mayar da ku."
arabic: وَقَالُواْ لِجُلُودِهِمۡ لِمَ شَهِدتُّمۡ عَلَيۡنَاۖ قَالُوٓاْ أَنطَقَنَا ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَنطَقَ كُلَّ شَيۡءٖۚ وَهُوَ خَلَقَكُمۡ أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٖ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
